title: To stoke creativity, crank out ideas and then step away

title_detail.value: To stoke creativity, crank out ideas and then step away

summary: There is an effective formula for unlocking employees' creative potential, according to new research. Employers should incentivize workers to produce an abundance of ideas -- even mediocre ones -- and then have them step away from the project for an 'incubation period.'
